name: Tangrowth
description: The Vine Pokémon. It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: This Pokémon’s speed is doubled in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.description: This Pokémon does not suffer from any negative status ailments in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.description: Once per long rest, this Pokémon regains hit points equal to its level when it returns to its Pokéball.
